activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:

DiscoverReady acts as a data processor and service provider solely on behalf of its clients and/or their legal counsel ("Client”) during its provision of any of the following services: data recovery, electronic discovery, computer forensics, litigation support, and/or related consulting ("Services"). Personal information may be collected in the EU (i) by the Client directly or by DiscoverReady personnel at the Client's direction or (ii) sent to DiscoverReady in the United States for processing. Data is then housed on secure servers in the United States which only DiscoverReady personnel or Client personnel who have a need to access such information for the purpose of performing the Services may access. As a service provider, DiscoverReady follows the direction from its Clients as to what data it is authorized to process. DiscoverReady may also receive Human Resources data from its EU operations, used for human resources purposes and DiscoverReady’s general business operations, for example for payroll, benefits, bonus plans, and invoicing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
